coreAttributes.name: Leather Bikini wrap
coreAttributes.description: A thick strip of leather, that's been fashioned in such a way so as to be wrapped around the chest in order to support a pair of breasts. A single loop has been incorporated into the side.

displacementText.playerSelf: You take off your leather wrap.
displacementText.playerNPCRough: You grab hold of [npc.name]'s leather wrap and roughly pull it off.
displacementText.NPCPlayerRough: [npc.Name] grabs hold of your leather wrap and roughly pulls it off.
displacementText.NPCOtherNPCRough: [npc.Name] grabs hold of [npc2.name]'s leather wrap and roughly pulls it off.

replacementText.playerSelf: You pull on the leather wrap.
replacementText.playerNPC: You get [npc.name] to wear the leather wrap.
replacementText.playerNPCRough: You hold [npc.name] still as you roughly force [npc.herHim] to wear the leather wrap.
replacementText.NPCPlayer: [npc.Name] gets you to wear the leather wrap.
replacementText.NPCPlayerRough: [npc.Name] holds you still as [npc.she] roughly forces you to wear the leather wrap.
replacementText.NPCOtherNPC: [npc1.Name] gets [npc2.name] to wear the leather wrap.
replacementText.NPCOtherNPCRough: [npc1.Name] holds [npc2.name] still as [npc1.she] roughly forces [npc2.herHim] to wear the leather wrap.
